nodes.text: Gwongdeenian sub-subterranean gastropods were a non-sentient species of large snails native to the planet Gwongdeen. With little to no intelligence, the gastropods simply created tracks through the corridors of Gwongdeen, and then followed their tracks over and over. The locals paid no attention to the Gwongdeenian sub-subterranean gastropods, who showed no awareness of their surroundings, only stopping if someone got in their way.
